title: Opti-Retreat Voting System
description: Developed a web-based voting application aimed at facilitating secure and efficient voting processes for organizational retreats.
achievements: Role-Based Access Control: Implemented a system distinguishing between admin and regular users, ensuring appropriate access levels and enhancing security.
Controlled Voting Sessions: Enabled admins to activate or deactivate voting periods, preventing unauthorized voting and maintaining process integrity.
Enhanced Voting Efficiency: Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface that streamlined the voting process, reducing the time required for vote casting and tallying by approximately 40%.
Improved Data Accuracy: Integrated real-time validation mechanisms to ensure the integrity of votes cast, minimizing errors and discrepancies in the final results.
Scalable Architecture: Built the application using scalable components, allowing for easy adaptation to larger events or organizations with minimal additional development effort.
Deployment and Accessibility: Deployed the application on Netlify, ensuring high availability and accessibility for users across various devices and locations.

title: API Miners GPT
description: Engineered enhanced ChatGPT using OpenAI and Stable Diffusion APIs, featuring audio I/O, OCR, and a child book generator, with an integrated bookstore for content distribution.

title: Mr. Bin
description: Web app that connects recyclers and sellers in order to encourage recycling and sell useless products. SPL 2 project.

title: MiniFacebook
description: Developed web app with Status, Story services in a Service Oriented Architecture. Distributed system project.

title: Text Summarizer Tool
description: Research project where input text is summarized using extractive techniques.

title: Gomoku - AI
description: A desktop game with AI opponent using minimax algorithm.
